name: Shutters
description: In the words of Ansel Adams, 'You don't take a photograph, you make it.'  Built on this cornerstone is Shutterbugs, the photography competition of IISc's annual fest, Pravega. Amaze us with your ideas, creativity, and verve to win big!

points: Participants can use any camera they want.
Participants must send RAW files along with their final photo. This is required unless participant can provide sufficient evidence that the work is their own.
A participant is allowed to submit a maximum of two photos in each category.
All details mentioned above must be provided in the submission email.

modules.heading: Submissions
modules.content: Participants need to send their photos, along with the RAW image (or some other evidence) as an email to shutterbugspravega2021@gmail.com. Camera settings, location, brief description recommended but optional.
